title: Week 7 preview & Heroes in London
itunes:title: Week 7 preview & Heroes in London
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, and Chris Wesseling - welcome in NFL Media's Andrew Siciliano as they break down each Week 7 matchup. Then, the heroes check in across the Pond with Marc Sessler and Connor Orr as they cover the Bills vs. Jaguars game in London. Plus, a recap of the Seahawks Thursday night victory over the 49ers.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
